website_summaries.verdict: The KEF M200s sound excellent, with clean, accurate sound, but they just won't fit some ears.
pros: The KEF M200 Hi-Fi Earphones deliver very clean, well-balanced sound and feature impressive build quality with aluminum housings and a flexible arm to keep the earphones securely in place
They also have an Apple-friendly inline remote/microphone and come with a nice carrying case
cons: Because the housing is so large, some people will have trouble getting a tight seal and comfortable fit with the included eartips
Not getting a tight seal will seriously impact sound quality

customer_reviews.title: low volume and painful.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get these to play at sufficient volume and they also are painful as heck on my ears... maybe they work for somebody but they don't work for me and I am the most average size ears on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: RonJon

customer_reviews.title: Very good phones for mobile
customer_reviews.text: These do sound great in some things - bass loaded in others. But they are ear bud style and for me they are very comfortable. I've only had them for a day so take my sound review with a grain of salt. They are definitely good for the price. However their original list was $ 200. I have other ear buds in that range which are better. But these are more comfortable for me and are more manageable for my Iphone right now. If I can tame the others these will go to my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Cameraman5052

customer_reviews.title: A disgrace to the KEF brand
customer_reviews.text: I use to have KEF 104/2 speakers and really liked them. KEF should be ashamed to put their name on these. You would be better off buying a pair of $10 earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad8888

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable fit once you get the hang of it, and good sturdy construction. Took these on a trip to India and for those long flights they were great. I own a pair of kef r300 speakers which have been fantastic so I figured give kef a try with headphones. Downside is that the fit is a little bit of a pain to get the hang off. They also won't fit everyone's ear... Do a good job of blocking outside ambient noise but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu Pete

customer_reviews.title: I think KEF makes the best sounding speakers I have ever heard
customer_reviews.text: I think KEF makes the best sounding speakers I have ever heard. But as other reviewers have said, these are the worst fitting earbuds ever! Painful and they don't stay in. Sound is amazing, but not enjoyable if they do not stay in your ear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big bass bang!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of in earphones with full size headphone bass. Cool design also, but they do stick out of your ears quite a bit. Treble can be a bit bright at times, but can be adjusted by tip rolling or eq. Besides that they are a very good set of phones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ray naro

customer_reviews.title: They pop out easily or they are too tight
customer_reviews.text: They don't fit very well regardless of which size of foam I use. They pop out easily or they are too tight. They do sound pretty good, but I mainly use them as a backup​ pair for the car in case I forget other ones (Sony) that I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Streight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound but bass is a little lean!! Great clarity on sound and voice!!
customer_reviews.author: Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: Sounds GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Sounded GREAT ... BUT they are bulky and I could NOT get them to even halfway fit . Sent them back ...
customer_reviews.author: dbuk2

customer_reviews.title: Silly Rabbit, Beats are for Kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance of bass and clarity... a treat for the grown audiophile. And the price point makes it a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crossovr

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad fit but still worth to keep
customer_reviews.text: Love the balanced sound these are capable of; as others have said having a dedicated bass driver allow for a better --and dedicated-- bass reproduction. Mids and highs sound balanced and well defined; soundtage is a usually bit compromissed on buds, but these felt like you aren't missing some air on your music. The only bad thing is fit, KEF should offer several more eartips options --I have to get a third party one to get the right fit on my somewhat small ear channels.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good, but it's not simple to fit the earbuds to ears easily
customer_reviews.author: Fabian rossotti

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite good even better once you understood how ear buds in foam take its final position.
customer_reviews.author: prigent christophe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad fit
customer_reviews.text: First things first. I loved the sound of these phones, a bit bassy, but not overbearing. They would still be with me except for one issue: I could not get them to feel comfortable, no matter how I tried. The sound tube is huge, larger than any other phones I have owned. And even with the smallest of tips, or different brand tips, they ended up causing a low grade ache in my ear canals. Sad, but true. So I had to return them. For sound, 5 stars. For fit, 3 stars. I know other people who have them fit fine, but not me.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff Lover

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: it's beautifull, very good song with it's. I LOVE IT and AMAZON.Very good sound in the headphones, Kef was able to offer a neutral sound, as we like. I can listen to the R'n'B, rap, soul, or I distinguished and classic sounds that I could hear with other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: LEBON/INCANA ISABELLE

customer_reviews.title: My ear holes are too small to wear the earphone ...
customer_reviews.text: My ear holes are too small to wear the earphone even though I set smallest ear tips. Sound is OK if I plug ear tips deep, but very difficult to do this due to above and uncomfortable for long time wearing.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the worst possible earphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst possible earphones. They just won't fit in the ear and if they do they don't sound good. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: sreekar sannapareddy

customer_reviews.title: They looked great in the photo of the earphones on the box
customer_reviews.text: I had just purchased a pair of these kef M200 a few days ago. They looked great in the photo of the earphones on the box. Once opened, and upon close inspection, the quaility and attractiveness just wasn't there. They looked like something from dollar store. I had real trouble with the fitting, it has to be the worse I had ever owned. They were bulky, won't fit right and constantly falling out when I open my mouth to talk/eat etc. I did a comparison with my generic earbuds that came with my phone and I couldn't tell the difference. Stay clear from this product.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: WOW, it really is miraculous.
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal headphones, huge sound clarity, even after having owned Bose quiet comfort and other not inexpensive over the ear units. I have not had a chance to wear these in a noisy environment but it blocks out virtually all background noise for me. I can turn the volume way down and clearly hear the entire tonal range. Great sound, but they are also super comfortable which make these really the first set of headphones that I truly enjoy listening through.
customer_reviews.author: depencil

customer_reviews.title: Best IEM in the price range when it was like ...
customer_reviews.text: Best IEM in the price range when it was like $150ish. now it is only $99. believe me its a steal!
customer_reviews.author: BPNN

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed - after reading some good reviews I decided to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed - after reading some good reviews I decided to purchase the headphones. My issues were simple - they did not fit well at all and the sound quality was not what you would expect at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: jr

product_meta.title: KEF M200 Hi-Fi In-Ear Headphones - Aluminum/Black
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWith two dedicated dynamic drivers, M200 hi-fi earphones allow you to enjoy the most delicate nuances of the original recording.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 * 
 * 













 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 *  Sweet, natural and beautifully balanced, KEF’s 40mm neodymium driver is tuned to deliver full range high definition response from 20Hz to 20kHz. Half the weight of conventional copper wire, the copper-clad aluminium wire voice coil improves HF response to enhance musical subtleties and detail. Each aperture in the tuning plate mounted over the drive unit in the acoustic chamber is precisely positioned to optimise clarity, dynamics and bass weighting. Opera or hip-hop, on the move or just chilling, you make the most of every note KEF’s discreet, flexible Secure Arm folds neatly to the shape of your ear to hold each earpiece in place, even when you’re moving around. Together with an ergonomic shell and soft silicone tips that fit snugly over the ear canal to form a tight acoustic seal that eliminates external noise, they feel so natural that you soon forget you’re wearing them. 
 * 
 *  Compatible with most smartphones, computers and other mobile devices. Featuring an integrated in-line microphone and remote control on a tangle-free flat cable for iPhone and other Apple products, it allows you to operate the play functions or switch between calls and music. Just plug in and relax for First Class entertainment. 
 * 
 *  A pair of M200 Hi-Fi Earphones High performance audio cable (1.2m) with gold plated connector, 3-button remote control and microphone Protective case Flight adapter 3 pairs of replaceable silicon eartips (S, M, L) 
 *
feature_bullets: Combining a 10mm LF driver and a 5.5mm neodymium MF/HF driver, KEF's unique Dual Dynamic Driver (DDD) array creates an engagingly natural sound right across the frequency range.

Secure Arm folds work together with an ergonomic shell and soft silicone tips that fit snugly over the ear canal to form a tight acoustic seal that eliminates external noise, they feel so natural that you soon forget you're wearing them.
M200 has an in-line microphone and remote control for iPhone and other Apple products, allowing you to operate the play functions or switch between calls and music.
In the box: M200 earphones, high performance audio cable with 3-button remote/mic for use with Apple products, protective case, flight adaptor, 3 pairs of replacement silicon ear tips
